util.config

Class StringConfigReaderFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.config.StringConfigReaderFactory

  • public class StringConfigReaderFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Factory methods to create configuration providers for common cases where strings are read from an underlying configuration store and transformed into objects.

      • makeBool

        public static ConfigProvider<java.lang.Boolean> makeBool(ConfigProvider<java.lang.String> configSource)
        Creates a boolean configuration reader. String values are read from the provided source configuration store using Boolean's valueOf method.
        Parameters:
        configSource - reads string items from configuration.
        Returns:
        a configuration provider to read boolean items.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any argument is null.

      • makeInt

        public static ConfigProvider<java.lang.Integer> makeInt(ConfigProvider<java.lang.String> configSource)
        Creates an integer configuration reader. String values are read from the provided source configuration store using Integer's valueOf method.
        Parameters:
        configSource - reads string items from configuration.
        Returns:
        a configuration provider to read integer items.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any argument is null.

      • makeURI

        public static ConfigProvider<java.net.URI> makeURI(ConfigProvider<java.lang.String> configSource)
        Creates a URI configuration reader. String values are read from the provided source configuration store using URI's valueOf method.
        Parameters:
        configSource - reads string items from configuration.
        Returns:
        a configuration provider to read integer items.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any argument is null.

      • makeEnum

        public static <T extends java.lang.Enum<T>> ConfigProvider<T> makeEnum(java.lang.Class<T> enumType,
                                                                       ConfigProvider<java.lang.String> configSource)
        Creates an enum configuration reader. String values are read from the provided source configuration store using the enum's valueOf method.
        Parameters:
        enumType - the the enum type for which to create the reader.
        configSource - reads string items from configuration.
        Returns:
        a configuration provider to read enum items.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any argument is null.
